description: Buffy the Vampire Slayer is returning to take a bite out of streaming, and Sarah Michelle Gellar is set to reprise her iconic role. The post Sarah Michelle Gellar to Headline Buffy the Vampire Slayer Reboot at Hulu appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: TVLine Items: Trump’s Super Bowl Q&A, Artful Dodger Additions and More
description: President Donald Trump will sit down for an interview with Fox News’ Bret Baier during the Fox Super Bowl LIX Pregame show on Sunday, Feb. 9 at 3 pm ET. Additional segments from the interview will air during Special Report With Bret Baier on Monday, Feb. 10 at 6 pm ET and will be available […]

title: A Buffy the Vampire Slayer Sequel Series Would Make Our Current Hellmouth a Little Easier to Face
description: Into every generation a Slayer is born, and I need the new one to get here, stakes blazing, ASAP. The news of Buffy the Vampire Slayer’s potential sequel series, a project in the works at Hulu, broke Monday. Sarah Michelle Gellar, aka Buffy herself, is said to be on board as a recurring presence in […]
author: Kimberly Roots
